resources.string: I am a strong, capable person.
I have overcome difficult challenges in the past, and I can do it again.
I am resilient because of the challenges I’ve faced.
It’s okay to feel upset, angry, or sad sometimes; it’s part of being human.
My personal boundaries are important, and I can express my needs to others.
“No” is a complete sentence, and I don’t need to justify my boundaries.
I deserve to feel good and experience pleasure in life.
I am worthy of receiving good things and achieving my goals.
The past doesn’t dictate my future; I can create a new path.
I forgive myself for mistakes and refuse to hold them against myself.
